statements: SELECT brand_name, carbon_footprint, water_usage FROM fashion_brand_environmental_impact;
SELECT * FROM fashion_brand_environmental_impact WHERE carbon_footprint > 50;
SELECT brand_name, manufacturing_process FROM fashion_brand_environmental_impact ORDER BY water_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_brand_environmental_impact WHERE waste_generation < 10 AND carbon_footprint < 20;
SELECT brand_name, carbon_footprint, waste_generation FROM fashion_brand_environmental_impact ORDER BY brand_name ASC;
SELECT brand_name, carbon_footprint, water_usage FROM fashion_brand_environmental_impact ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC, water_usage ASC
SELECT * FROM fashion_brand_environmental_impact WHERE carbon_footprint > 100 AND water_usage < 50
SELECT brand_name, manufacturing_process FROM fashion_brand_environmental_impact WHERE waste_generation > 10 ORDER BY waste_generation DESC
SELECT DISTINCT brand_name FROM fashion_brand_environmental_impact
SELECT brand_name, carbon_footprint, water_usage, waste_generation FROM fashion_brand_environmental_impact ORDER BY carbon_footprint ASC, waste_generation DESC
SELECT * FROM fashion_brands;
SELECT brand_name, country FROM fashion_brands;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact WHERE impact_id = 1;
SELECT brand_name, manufacturing_process FROM fashion_brands WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT brand_name, sustainability_goals FROM fashion_brands WHERE sustainability_goals IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM fashion_brands ORDER BY brand_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT brand_name, country, manufacturing_process FROM fashion_brands WHERE country='Italy';
SELECT brand_name, sustainability_goals FROM fashion_brands WHERE sustainability_goals IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact WHERE emission_levels='Low' OR water_usage='Low';

SELECT brand_name, emission_levels, water_usage, waste_generation FROM fashion_brands JOIN environmental_impact ON fashion_brands.brand_id = environmental_impact.brand_id ORDER BY emission_levels ASC, water_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM brand;
SELECT brand_name, country FROM brand WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT brand_name, website FROM brand ORDER BY brand_name ASC;
SELECT brand_name, website, country FROM brand WHERE country = 'Canada' ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, material FROM product WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM brand WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY brand_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, price FROM product WHERE material = 'organic' ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT brand_name, country, website FROM brand INNER JOIN product ON brand.brand_id = product.brand_id ORDER BY brand_name, price DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT brand.brand_name, sustainability_goals.goal_description, sustainability_goals.progress FROM brand INNER JOIN sustainability_goals ON brand.brand_id = sustainability_goals.brand_id ORDER BY sustainability_goals.progress DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM brand WHERE website LIKE '%.com' AND country != 'Canada' ORDER BY brand_id LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Brand;
SELECT brand_name, country FROM Brand;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE price > 50;
SELECT material_name, type, cost_per_unit FROM Materials ORDER BY cost_per_unit DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(carbon_footprint) AS total_carbon_footprint FROM Manufacturing_Process GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM Brand ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT brand_name, country FROM Brand WHERE country='USA';
SELECT p.product_name, b.brand_name, p.price FROM Product p JOIN Brand b ON p.brand_id = b.brand_id;
SELECT m.material_name, m.type, mp.quantity, mp.carbon_footprint FROM Materials m JOIN Manufacturing_Process mp ON m.material_id = mp.material_id;
SELECT b.brand_name, COUNT(p.product_id) AS total_products FROM Brand b JOIN Product p ON b.brand_id = p.brand_id GROUP BY b.brand_name ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM Brand;
SELECT brand_name, headquarters_location FROM Brand ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Product WHERE price > 50;
SELECT process_name, energy_consumption, carbon_emission FROM ManufacturingProcess WHERE energy_consumption < 100;

SELECT Product.product_name, ManufacturingProcess.process_name, ProductManufacturing.quantity FROM Product INNER JOIN ProductManufacturing ON Product.product_id = ProductManufacturing.product_id ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Brand;
SELECT Product.product_name, Brand.brand_name, Product.price FROM Product JOIN Brand ON Product.brand_id = Brand.brand_id;

SELECT ManufacturingProcess.process_name, SUM(ProductManufacturing.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM ManufacturingProcess JOIN ProductManufacturing ON ManufacturingProcess.process_id = ProductManufacturing.process_id GROUP BY ManufacturingProcess.process_name;

SELECT Brand.brand_name, SustainabilityGoals.carbon_emission_goal, SustainabilityGoals.energy_consumption_goal FROM Brand JOIN SustainabilityGoals ON Brand.brand_id = SustainabilityGoals.brand_id WHERE SustainabilityGoals.carbon_emission_goal > 100;

SELECT Product.product_name, Brand.brand_name, ManufacturingProcess.process_name FROM Product JOIN Brand ON Product.brand_id = Brand.brand_id JOIN ProductManufacturing ON Product.product_id = ProductManufacturing.product_id JOIN ManufacturingProcess ON ProductManufacturing.process_id = ManufacturingProcess.process_id WHERE Product.price < 50;
